name: Nancy's Orange Chicken
ingredients: 2 green peppers, cut into strips (8 1/4 ounces trimmed)
1/2 cup plus 1 tablespoon plus 2 teaspoons granular Splenda or equivalent liquid Splenda

instructions.en: Combine marinade ingredients. Pour scant 3/4 cup over chicken in zipper bag. Marinate 30-60 minutes.
Drain chicken in colander, reserving marinade.
Heat oil in wok. Saut√© vegetables until tender-crisp; set aside.
Cook chicken until no longer pink outside. Add unused and reserved marinade, simmer 15 minutes.
Return vegetables to wok and heat through.

notes: Makes 6-8 servings. You can substitute 1/4 cup orange juice + 4 packets True Orange + 1/4 cup water to save carbs.
